data.name: Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium: Mini-Album Track 6 - Tiger Road - Gold Dragon Mansion (1st Stage Theme)
data.detailed_description:
Track 6 of Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium: Mini Album dishes out the first stage theme of Tiger Road, a tune befitting of an action-packed side-scroller!

Don't miss out on this classic!
